懂事.definition: to grow beyond the naivete of childhood; to be aware of what is going on in the world; (esp. of a child) sensible; thoughtful; intelligent

懂得.definition: to understand; to know; to comprehend

懂眼.definition: (coll.) to know the ropes; an expert

懂門兒.definition: one who knows his business; professional; expert; au fait
